# LaLaRef 急單王 - 香港籃球球證預訂服務
# LaLaRef Express - Hong Kong Basketball Referee Booking Service

> For complete detailed documentation, see: https://www.lalaref.com/llms-full.txt

## Summary

LaLaRef is Hong Kong's professional basketball referee booking platform. We provide licensed referees for private matches, private leagues, school tournaments, corporate events, and friendly games across all districts. Same-day urgent booking available 24/7.

## Key Facts

- Website: https://www.lalaref.com
- WhatsApp: +852 8482 8484
- Service Area: All Hong Kong (Kowloon, Hong Kong Island, New Territories)
- Languages: 中文（繁體）, English
- Available: 24/7 including weekends and public holidays
- Rating: 4.8/5 (50+ reviews)

## Services

- 私人籃球球證 Private Basketball Referee — HKD $220/hr/referee
- 私人籃球聯賽球證 Private League Referee — Full-season packages
- 學界籃球球證 School Basketball Referee — Licensed, school-recognized
- 私人機構籃球比賽球證 Organization/Corporate Referee
- 即日緊急球證 Same-Day Urgent Booking — 24/7
- 一條龍賽事服務 One-Stop Event Service — Scoring, photography, videography
- 籃球教學 Basketball Coaching

## Additional Services & Pricing

- Event Photography: HKD $200/hr
- Scorekeeping: HKD $120/hr
- Match Videography: HKD $80/hr
- Equipment (scoreboards, score sheets, cameras): Free

## How to Book

1. WhatsApp 8482 8484 or visit www.lalaref.com
2. Provide: date, time, venue, format (5v5/3v3)
3. Confirm booking
4. Pay via PayMe or FPS

## Contact

- WhatsApp: +852 8482 8484 (fastest)
- Website: https://www.lalaref.com
- Hours: 24/7
